author: martin
msg: The first correction is not important, only removes a redundant line,
the ap_pstrdup(a, "127.0.0.1") is done anyway at the end of the function.
The second correction is really a bug the p-> can be NULL.

author: gstein
msg: *) mod_dav.c: allow PUT to a WORKING resource (this actually the only valid
*) util.c: add a comment. allow validation to proceed without a lock
database (the rest of the code supported it; one erroneous check disabled
*) util_lock.c: allow dav_unlock() to be a no-op when a lock provide isn't
present; this allows DELETE to work.
